report.title: Get last effort
report.description: Retrives the last effort data for a sighting, having entered the time.
report.query: SELECT sav.sample_attribute_id, coalesce(sav.int_value::varchar, sav.float_value::varchar, sav.text_value) as val FROM sample_attribute_values sav WHERE sample_id in ( SELECT s.id FROM samples s JOIN sample_attribute_values sav ON sav.sample_id=s.id WHERE sav.text_value<'#time#' AND s.parent_id=#parent_sample_id# ORDER BY sav.text_value DESC LIMIT 1 ) AND sav.sample_attribute_id not in (#exclusions#)

param.name: parent_sample_id
param.description: Sample ID for the parent sample
